API.Comments: Constructs a CipherOutputStream from an OutputStream without specifying a Cipher.
Constructs a CipherOutputStream from an OutputStream and a Cipher.
Closes this output stream and releases any system resources associated with this stream.
Flushes this output stream by forcing any buffered output bytes that have already been processed by the encapsulated cipher object to be written out.
API.Function: write(byte[] b, int off, int len)

API.Comments: Writes b.length bytes from the specified byte array to this output stream.
